title: In-service Training for Strengthening Social Subject Teaching Competencies Using Gamification-Based WebQuests

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of basic ICT application skills and foundational experience in teaching social studies
context.additional_context: Lack of instructional design experience with digital devices; need for cooperative learning and problem-solving-centered lesson design.

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can complete the design of social studies lessons integrating WebQuests and gamification elements
Inquiry-based collaborative learning scenarios in digital environments can be executed with 90% participation rate
Over 75% of learners can develop lesson evaluation rubrics applying gamification principles (mission structure, reward systems, etc.)

resources: Social Studies Standard Learning Materials Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
